##### FILE: etcd_backup_cj-dce4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-backup/ConfigMap/backup-etcd-code:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  backup.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash

    calicoLockMode="lock"
    calicoUnlockMode="unlock"
    inputLockMode=$calicoLockMode

    inputLockMode=${LOCK:=""}
    if [ "$inputLockMode" = "$calicoUnlockMode" ]; then
      echo "[Warning] You will backup with no calico ipam lock!"
    else
      echo "You will backup with calico ipam lock."
    fi

    etcd_container=`docker ps |grep 'dce-etcd-dce' | grep -v pause | awk '{print $1}'`
    cluster_health=`docker exec -e ETCDCTL_API=2 $etcd_container etcdctl cluster-health`
    echo "Etcd cluster health status $cluster_health"
    health=$(echo ${cluster_health}| awk '{print $NF}')
    if [ "$health" != "healthy" ]; then
        echo "[Error] Etcd cluster is unhealthy nowplease repair to healthy before backup."
        exit
    else
        mkdir -p /tmp/etcd_backup
        cp -f /tmp/info/* /tmp/etcd_backup/
        docker cp `docker ps |grep etcd | grep -v pause | awk '{print $1}'`:/usr/local/bin/etcdctl /tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl
        echo "Please input the directory where you want to save the etcd backup datadefault will be /tmp/etcd_backup"
        read backup_dir
        echo "$backup_dir"
    fi
    if [ -z "$backup_dir" ];then
        backup_dir="/tmp/etcd_backup"
        echo "The default backup path $backup_dir will be used."
    fi
    if [ -d "$backup_dir" ]; then
        mkdir -p $backup_dir
    fi

    export ETCDCTL_API=2
    export param="--endpoints=https://localhost:12379 --cert-file=/etc/daocloud/dce/certs/etcd/server.crt --key-file=/etc/daocloud/dce/certs/etcd/server.key --ca-file=/etc/daocloud/dce/certs/ca.crt"
    echo "Starting to backup..."
    num=0
    timestamp=`date +"%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)"`
    for k in $(/tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl $param ls --recursive -p | grep -v "/$")
    do
      v=$(/tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl $param get $k)
      if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        value=${v//\'/\'\\\'\'}
        # value=$(echo $value| sed "s/\'/\'\\\'\'/g")
        num=$((num+1))
        echo "ETCDCTL_API=2 /tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl $param set $k '$value'" >> ${backup_dir}/backup_v2_${timestamp}.sh
      else
        echo "[Error] Etcd2 backup error, please manually check for problems, if the error contains Key not found, please try backup again."
        rm -rf ${backup_dir}/backup_v2_${timestamp}.sh
        exit 1
      fi
    done
    echo "ETCDCTL_API=2 /tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl $param rm /DCE/v1/primary" >> ${backup_dir}/backup_v2_${timestamp}.sh
    echo "${num} V2 keys has been successfully backed up."
    chmod +x ${backup_dir}/backup_v2_${timestamp}.sh

    if [ "$inputLockMode" = "$calicoLockMode" ]; then
      calicoctl ipam show >/dev/null 2>&1
      if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        calicoctl datastore migrate lock
      else
        echo "[Error] calicoctl connection failed, please manually check for problems."
        exit 1
      fi
    fi

    export ETCDCTL_API=3
    export param="--endpoints=https://localhost:12379 --cert=/etc/daocloud/dce/certs/etcd/server.crt --key=/etc/daocloud/dce/certs/etcd/server.key --cacert=/etc/daocloud/dce/certs/ca.crt"
    /tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl $param snapshot save ${backup_dir}/backup_v3_${timestamp}.db && /tmp/etcd_backup/etcdctl $param --write-out=table snapshot status ${backup_dir}/backup_v3_${timestamp}.db

    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
      echo "The etcd data has been backed up as ${backup_dir}/backup_v2_${timestamp}.sh and ${backup_dir}/backup_v3_${timestamp}.db"
    else
      echo "[Error] Etcd3 backup error, please manually check for problems."
      rm -rf ${backup_dir}/backup_v2_${timestamp}.sh
      rm -rf ${backup_dir}/backup_v3_${timestamp}.db

      if [ "$inputLockMode" = "$calicoLockMode" ]; then
        calicoctl datastore migrate unlock
      fi

      exit 1
    fi

    if [ "$inputLockMode" = "$calicoLockMode" ]; then
      calicoctl datastore migrate unlock
    fi
    if [ "${RETENTION_POLICY}" = "day" ];then
      find ${backup_dir} -name "backup.*" -mtime +${RETENTION} -delete
    elif [ "${RETENTION_POLICY}" = "file" ];then
      RETENTION=$((${RETENTION}+1))
      ls -t ${backup_dir}/backup_v2* | sed -n "${RETENTION},\$p" | xargs -i rm -f {}
      ls -t ${backup_dir}/backup_v3* | sed -n "${RETENTION},\$p" | xargs -i rm -f {}
    else
      echo "${RETENTION_POLICY} not support!"
      exit 1
    fi
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: backup-etcd-code
  namespace: kube-backup

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

  - list

  - watch

##### FILE: etcd_statefulset_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/pl-etcd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd_cluster: pl-etcd
  name: pl-etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  podManagementPolicy: Parallel
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      etcd_cluster: pl-etcd
  serviceName: pl-etcd
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: etcd
        etcd_cluster: pl-etcd
        plane: control
      name: pl-etcd
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE
          value: "3"
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          value: pl-etcd
        - name: ETCDCTL_API
          value: "3"
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: DATA_DIR
          value: /var/run/etcd
        - name: ETCD_AUTO_COMPACTION_RETENTION
          value: "5"
        - name: ETCD_AUTO_COMPACTION_MODE
          value: revision
        image: gcr.io/pixie-oss/pixie-dev-public/etcd:3.5.9@sha256:e18afc6dda592b426834342393c4c4bd076cb46fa7e10fa7818952cae3047ca9
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /etc/etcd/scripts/prestop.sh
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /etc/etcd/scripts/healthcheck.sh
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2379
          name: client
        - containerPort: 2380
          name: server
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /etc/etcd/scripts/healthcheck.sh
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/etcd
          name: etcd-data
        - mountPath: /etc/etcdtls/member/peer-tls
          name: member-peer-tls
        - mountPath: /etc/etcdtls/member/server-tls
          name: member-server-tls
        - mountPath: /etc/etcdtls/client/etcd-tls
          name: etcd-client-tls
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64
      volumes:
      - name: member-peer-tls
        secret:
          secretName: etcd-peer-tls-certs
      - name: member-server-tls
        secret:
          secretName: etcd-server-tls-certs
      - name: etcd-client-tls
        secret:
          secretName: etcd-client-tls-certs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: etcd-data

##### FILE: etcd15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/etcd-server:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: etcd-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /usr/local/bin/etcd
    - --name
    - ${NODE_NAME}
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --listen-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --advertise-client-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2379
    - --listen-client-urls
    - http://127.0.0.1:2379
    - --data-dir
    - /var/etcd/data
    - --discovery
    - ${DISCOVERY_TOKEN}
    image: registry.k8s.io/etcd:2.0.9
    name: etcd-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 2380
      hostPort: 2380
      name: serverport
    - containerPort: 2379
      hostPort: 2379
      name: clientport
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/etcd
      name: varetcd
    - mountPath: /etc/ssl
      name: etcssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/share/ssl
      name: usrsharessl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /var/ssl
      name: varssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/ssl
      name: usrssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/lib/ssl
      name: usrlibssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/local/openssl
      name: usrlocalopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/openssl
      name: etcopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/pki/tls
      name: etcpkitls
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/etcd/data
    name: varetcd
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/ssl
    name: etcssl

##### FILE: etcd17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/etcd-server:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: etcd-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /usr/local/bin/etcd
    - --name
    - ${NODE_NAME}
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --listen-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --advertise-client-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2379
    - --listen-client-urls
    - http://127.0.0.1:2379
    - --data-dir
    - /var/etcd/data
    - --discovery
    - ${DISCOVERY_TOKEN}
    image: registry.k8s.io/etcd:2.0.9
    name: etcd-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 2380
      hostPort: 2380
      name: serverport
    - containerPort: 2379
      hostPort: 2379
      name: clientport
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/etcd
      name: varetcd
    - mountPath: /etc/ssl
      name: etcssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/share/ssl
      name: usrsharessl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /var/ssl
      name: varssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/ssl
      name: usrssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/lib/ssl
      name: usrlibssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/local/openssl
      name: usrlocalopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/openssl
      name: etcopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/pki/tls
      name: etcpkitls
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/etcd/data
    name: varetcd
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/ssl
    name: etcssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/share/ssl
    name: usrsharessl
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/ssl
    name: varssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/ssl
    name: usrssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/lib/ssl
    name: usrlibssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/local/openssl
    name: usrlocalopenssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/openssl
    name: etcopenssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/pki/tls
    name: etcpkitls

##### FILE: etcd19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    kubeadm.kubernetes.io/etcd.advertise-client-urls: https://192.168.3.10:2379
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: etcd
    tier: control-plane
  name: etcd
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - etcd
    - --advertise-client-urls=https://192.168.3.10:2379
    - --auto-tls=false
    - --cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.crt
    - --client-cert-auth=true
    - --data-dir=/var/lib/etcd
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://192.168.3.10:2380
    - --initial-cluster=k8s-master=https://192.168.3.10:2380
    - --key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.key
    - --listen-client-urls=https://127.0.0.1:2379,https://192.168.3.10:2379
    - --listen-metrics-urls=http://127.0.0.1:2381
    - --listen-peer-urls=https://192.168.3.10:2380
    - --name=k8s-master
    - --peer-auto-tls=false
    - --peer-cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.crt
    - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
    - --peer-key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.key
    - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    - --snapshot-count=10000
    - --trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    image: k8s.gcr.io/etcd:3.4.13-0
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 8
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /health
        port: 2381
        scheme: HTTP
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    name: etcd
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        ephemeral-storage: 100Mi
        memory: 100Mi
    startupProbe:
      failureThreshold: 24
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /health
        port: 2381
        scheme: HTTP
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
      name: etcd-data
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      name: etcd-certs
  hostNetwork: true
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-certs
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-data
status: {}

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: my-etcd
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: etcd37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: etcd
  name: etcd
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - /usr/local/bin/etcd
    - --config-file=/etc/etcd/etcd.config.yml
    image: ${etcdImage}
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: etcd
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 250m
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/etcd
      name: conf
    - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
      name: data
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      name: pki
  hostNetwork: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: conf
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: data
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: pki

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/containers/0/resources/limits/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource kube-system/Pod/etcd failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: etcd4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/etcd-server:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: etcd-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /usr/local/bin/etcd
    - --name
    - ${NODE_NAME}
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --listen-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --advertise-client-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2379
    - --listen-client-urls
    - http://127.0.0.1:2379
    - --data-dir
    - /var/etcd/data
    - --discovery
    - ${DISCOVERY_TOKEN}
    image: registry.k8s.io/etcd:2.0.9
    name: etcd-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 2380
      hostPort: 2380
      name: serverport
    - containerPort: 2379
      hostPort: 2379
      name: clientport
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/etcd
      name: varetcd
    - mountPath: /etc/ssl
      name: etcssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/share/ssl
      name: usrsharessl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /var/ssl
      name: varssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/ssl
      name: usrssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/lib/ssl
      name: usrlibssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/local/openssl
      name: usrlocalopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/openssl
      name: etcopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/pki/tls
      name: etcpkitls
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/etcd/data
    name: varetcd
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/ssl
    name: etcssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/share/ssl
    name: usrsharessl
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/ssl
    name: varssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/ssl
    name: usrssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/lib/ssl
    name: usrlibssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/local/openssl
    name: usrlocalopenssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/openssl
    name: etcopenssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/pki/tls
    name: etcpkitls

---

      hostPort: 2379

      name: clientport

      name: etcssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/share/ssl
      name: usrsharessl
      readOnly: true

      name: usrssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/lib/ssl
      name: usrlibssl
      readOnly: true

      name: usrlocalopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/openssl
      name: etcopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/pki/tls
      name: etcpkitls
      readOnly: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    kubeadm.kubernetes.io/etcd.advertise-client-urls: https://192.6.49.6:2379
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: etcd
    tier: control-plane
  name: etcd
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - etcd
    - --advertise-client-urls=https://192.6.49.6:2379
    - --cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.crt
    - --client-cert-auth=true
    - --data-dir=/var/lib/etcd
    - --experimental-initial-corrupt-check=true
    - --experimental-watch-progress-notify-interval=5s
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://192.6.49.6:2380
    - --initial-cluster=controlplane=https://192.6.49.6:2380
    - --key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.key
    - --listen-client-urls=https://127.0.0.1:2379,https://192.6.49.6:2379
    - --listen-metrics-urls=http://127.0.0.1:2381
    - --listen-peer-urls=https://192.6.49.6:2380
    - --name=controlplane
    - --peer-cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.crt
    - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
    - --peer-key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.key
    - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    - --snapshot-count=10000
    - --trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    image: registry.k8s.io/etcd:3.5.10-0
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 8
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /health?exclude=NOSPACE&serializable=true
        port: 2381
        scheme: HTTP
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    name: etcd
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 100Mi
    startupProbe:
      failureThreshold: 24
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /health?serializable=false
        port: 2381
        scheme: HTTP
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
      name: etcd-data
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      name: etcd-certs
  hostNetwork: true
  priority: 2000001000
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  securityContext:
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-certs
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-data

##### FILE: etcd62_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/etcd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  podManagementPolicy: Parallel
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: etcd
  serviceName: etcd
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        serviceName: dns
      labels:
        app: etcd
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - etcd
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - --name=$(HOSTNAME)
        - --data-dir=/data
        - --wal-dir=/data/wal
        - --listen-peer-urls=$(URI_SCHEME)://0.0.0.0:2380
        - --listen-client-urls=$(URI_SCHEME)://0.0.0.0:2379
        - --advertise-client-urls=$(URI_SCHEME)://$(HOSTNAME).$(SERVICE_NAME):2379
        - --initial-cluster-state=new
        - --initial-cluster-token=etcd-$(K8S_NAMESPACE)
        - --initial-cluster=etcd-0=$(URI_SCHEME)://etcd-0.$(SERVICE_NAME):2380,etcd-1=$(URI_SCHEME)://etcd-1.$(SERVICE_NAME):2380,etcd-2=$(URI_SCHEME)://etcd-2.$(SERVICE_NAME):2380
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=$(URI_SCHEME)://$(HOSTNAME).$(SERVICE_NAME):2380
        - --listen-metrics-urls=http://0.0.0.0:8080
        command:
        - /usr/local/bin/etcd
        env:
        - name: K8S_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: SERVICE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ETCDCTL_ENDPOINTS
          value: $(HOSTNAME).$(SERVICE_NAME):2379
        - name: URI_SCHEME
          value: http
        image: quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.6.0-alpha.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2379
          name: etcd-client
        - containerPort: 2380
          name: etcd-server
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: etcd-metrics
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: etcd-data
      volumes: null
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: etcd-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/etcd

##### FILE: etcd7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    kubeadm.kubernetes.io/etcd.advertise-client-urls: https://192.168.3.10:2379
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: etcd
    tier: control-plane
  name: etcd
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - etcd
    - --advertise-client-urls=https://192.168.3.10:2379
    - --auto-tls=false
    - --cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.crt
    - --client-cert-auth=true
    - --data-dir=/var/lib/etcd
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://192.168.3.10:2380
    - --initial-cluster=k8s-master=https://192.168.3.10:2380
    - --key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server.key
    - --listen-client-urls=https://127.0.0.1:2379,https://192.168.3.10:2379
    - --listen-metrics-urls=http://127.0.0.1:2381
    - --listen-peer-urls=https://192.168.3.10:2380
    - --name=k8s-master
    - --peer-auto-tls=false
    - --peer-cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.crt
    - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
    - --peer-key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/peer.key
    - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    - --snapshot-count=10000
    - --trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    image: k8s.gcr.io/etcd:3.4.13-0
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 8
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /health
        port: 2381
        scheme: HTTP
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    name: etcd
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        ephemeral-storage: 100Mi
        memory: 100Mi
    startupProbe:
      failureThreshold: 24
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /health
        port: 2381
        scheme: HTTP
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
      name: etcd-data
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      name: etcd-certs
  hostNetwork: true
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-certs
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-data
status: {}

##### FILE: etcd81.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/etcd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: etcd
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: etcd
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: etcd
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/etcd
        - -name=etcd
        - -advertise-client-urls=http://0.0.0.0:2379
        - -initial-advertise-peer-urls=http://0.0.0.0:2380
        - -listen-client-urls=http://0.0.0.0:2379
        - -listen-peer-urls=http://0.0.0.0:2380
        - -initial-cluster=etcd=http://0.0.0.0:2380
        - --data-dir=/var/run/etcd/default.etcd
        - -initial-cluster-state=new
        - -initial-cluster-token=etcd-cluster
        image: registry.k8s.io/etcd:3.4.3-0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: etcd
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/etcd
          name: datadir
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: datadir

---

##### FILE: etcd82.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/StatefulSet/etcd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: etcd
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: dynamic_parameters
  selector:
    matchLabels: null
  serviceName: etcd
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels: null
    spec:
      affinity: null
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/etcd
        - --name
        - $(KARMADA_ETCD_NAME)
        - --listen-peer-urls
        - http://0.0.0.0:2380
        - --listen-client-urls
        - https://0.0.0.0:2379
        - --advertise-client-urls
        - https://etcd-client.dynamic_parameters.svc.dynamic_parameters:2379
        - --initial-cluster
        - dynamic_parameters
        - --initial-cluster-state
        - new
        - --cert-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/karmada.crt
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --key-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/karmada.key
        - --trusted-ca-file=/etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server-ca.crt
        - --data-dir=/var/lib/etcd
        - --cipher-suites=TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305
        env:
        - name: KARMADA_ETCD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -ec
            - etcdctl get /registry --prefix --keys-only  --endpoints https://127.0.0.1:2379  --cacert
              /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/server-ca.crt --cert /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/karmada.crt
              --key /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/karmada.key
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 600
          periodSeconds: 60
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2379
          name: client
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 2380
          name: server
          protocol: TCP
        resources: null
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
          name: etcd-data
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
          name: etcd-cert
          readOnly: true
      nodeSelector: null
      tolerations: null
      volumes:
      - name: etcd-cert
        secret:
          secretName: dynamic_parameters-cert
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/dynamic_parameters/karmada-etcd
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: etcd-data
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: etcd-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: dynamic_parameters
      storageClassName: dynamic_parameters

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/etcd-server:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: etcd-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /usr/local/bin/etcd
    - --name
    - ${NODE_NAME}
    - --initial-advertise-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --listen-peer-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2380
    - --advertise-client-urls
    - http://${NODE_IP}:2379
    - --listen-client-urls
    - http://127.0.0.1:2379
    - --data-dir
    - /var/etcd/data
    - --discovery
    - ${DISCOVERY_TOKEN}
    image: registry.k8s.io/etcd:2.0.9
    name: etcd-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 2380
      hostPort: 2380
      name: serverport
    - containerPort: 2379
      hostPort: 2379
      name: clientport
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/etcd
      name: varetcd
    - mountPath: /etc/ssl
      name: etcssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/share/ssl
      name: usrsharessl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /var/ssl
      name: varssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/ssl
      name: usrssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/lib/ssl
      name: usrlibssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/local/openssl
      name: usrlocalopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/openssl
      name: etcopenssl
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/pki/tls
      name: etcpkitls
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/etcd/data
    name: varetcd
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/ssl
    name: etcssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/share/ssl
    name: usrsharessl
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/ssl
    name: varssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/ssl
    name: usrssl
  - hostPath:
      path: /usr/lib/ssl

kind: Job

  name: backup-etcd-job
  namespace: default

  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: etcd
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ETCDCTL_API=3 etcdctl --endpoints=etcdserver:2379 snapshot save "etcd-snapshot-latest-`date
          +"%!d(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!Y(MISSING)-%!H(MISSING)-%!M(MISSING)"`.db"
        image: lerndevops/samples:etcdctl
        name: etcd
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/etcd-backup
          name: hpvol
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/etcd-backup
        name: hpvol

---

##### FILE: etcdclient.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/etcdclient:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    component: etcdclient
  name: etcdclient
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - 9999d
    env:
    - name: ETCDCTL_API
      value: "3"
    - name: ETCDCTL_CACERT
      value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    - name: ETCDCTL_CERT
      value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.crt
    - name: ETCDCTL_KEY
      value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.key
    - name: ETCDCTL_ENDPOINTS
      value: https://127.0.0.1:2379
    image: k8s.gcr.io/etcd:3.3.10
    name: etcdclient
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      name: etcd-certs
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  nodeName: kind-control-plane
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-certs

---

##### FILE: etcdclient1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/etcdclient:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: etcdclient
    tier: debug
  name: etcdclient
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - 9999d
    env:
    - name: ETCDCTL_API
      value: "3"
    - name: ETCDCTL_CACERT
      value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/ca.crt
    - name: ETCDCTL_CERT
      value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.crt
    - name: ETCDCTL_KEY
      value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd/healthcheck-client.key
    - name: ETCDCTL_ENDPOINTS
      value: https://127.0.0.1:2379
    image: apecloud/etcd:v3.5.6
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: etcdclient
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      name: etcd-certs
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
      name: etcd-data
      readOnly: false
  hostNetwork: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-certs
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/etcd
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: etcd-data

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: etcd-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: etcdcluster-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: etcd-operator
  name: etcdcluster-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - etcd.aenix.io
  resources:
  - etcdclusters
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - etcd.aenix.io
  resources:
  - etcdclusters/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: etcd-controller.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/etcd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: etcd
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: etcd
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ETCD_NUM_MEMBERS
          value: "3"
        - name: ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_STATE
          value: new
        - name: ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_TOKEN
          value: INSERT_ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_TOKEN
        - name: ETCD_DISCOVERY_TOKEN
          value: INSERT_ETCD_DISCOVERY_TOKEN
        - name: ETCD_DISCOVERY_URL
          value: http://etcd-discovery:2379
        - name: ETCDCTL_PEERS
          value: http://etcd:2379
        image: openshift/etcd-20-centos7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: member
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2379
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 2380
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          capabilities: {}
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccount: ""
status: {}

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/etcd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: etcd
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: etcd
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ETCD_NUM_MEMBERS
          value: "3"
        - name: ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_STATE
          value: new
        - name: ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_TOKEN
          value: INSERT_ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_TOKEN
        - name: ETCD_DISCOVERY_TOKEN
          value: INSERT_ETCD_DISCOVERY_TOKEN
        - name: ETCD_DISCOVERY_URL
          value: http://etcd-discovery:2379
        - name: ETCDCTL_PEERS
          value: http://etcd:2379
        image: openshift/etcd-20-centos7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: member
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2379
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 2380
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          capabilities: {}
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccount: ""
status: {}

##### FILE: etcd-operator.deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/etcd-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: etcd-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: etcd-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: etcd-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd-operator
        - --create-crd=false
        env:
        - name: MY_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: MY_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: quay.io/coreos/etcd-operator:v0.9.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: etcd-operator
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      serviceAccountName: etcd-operator-sa

##### FILE: etcd-pod.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-ca
          name: volume-etcd-ca
      volumes:
      - name: volume-serving-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: serving-etcd
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: etcd-ca
        name: volume-etcd-ca

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-ca
          name: volume-etcd-ca
      volumes:
      - name: volume-serving-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: serving-etcd
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: etcd-ca
        name: volume-etcd-ca

##### FILE: etcd-pod15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-ca
          name: volume-etcd-ca
      volumes:
      - name: volume-serving-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: serving-etcd
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: etcd-ca
        name: volume-etcd-ca

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-ca
          name: volume-etcd-ca
      volumes:
      - name: volume-serving-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: serving-etcd
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: etcd-ca
        name: volume-etcd-ca

kind: ReplicationController
metadata:

    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15

        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert

kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:

        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001

        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert

        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-ca
          name: volume-etcd-ca
      volumes:
      - name: volume-serving-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: serving-etcd
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: etcd-ca
        name: volume-etcd-ca

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:

        etcd: "true"

      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert

          defaultMode: 420

        name: volume-etcd-ca

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    etcd: "true"
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    etcd: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        etcd: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - etcd
        - --listen-client-urls=https://0.0.0.0:4001
        - --advertise-client-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:4001
        - --trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --client-cert-auth=true
        - --listen-peer-urls=https://0.0.0.0:7001
        - --initial-advertise-peer-urls=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        - --peer-trusted-ca-file=/var/run/serving-ca/ca.crt
        - --peer-cert-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.crt
        - --peer-key-file=/var/run/serving-cert/tls.key
        - --peer-client-cert-auth=true
        - --initial-cluster=default=https://etcd.kube-public.svc:7001
        image: quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.0.15
        name: etcd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-ca
          name: volume-etcd-ca
      volumes:
      - name: volume-serving-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: serving-etcd
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: etcd-ca
        name: volume-etcd-ca

##### FILE: etcd-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/etcd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    name: etcd
  name: etcd
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: client
    nodePort: 0
    port: 2379
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 2379
  - name: server
    nodePort: 0
    port: 2380
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 2380
  selector:
    name: etcd
  sessionAffinity: None
  type: ClusterIP
status:
  loadBalancer: {}

---

##### FILE: ethereum-lite-explorer-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ethereum-lite-explorer-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ethereum-lite-explorer-deployment
    project: ethernetes
  name: ethereum-lite-explorer-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ethereum-lite-explorer-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ethereum-lite-explorer-pod
        project: ethernetes
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ethereum-lite-explorer-configmap
        image: docker.io/alethio/ethereum-lite-explorer:latest
        name: ethereum-lite-explorer-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi

---

    project: ethernetes
  name: ether-faucet-redis-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ether-faucet-redis-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ether-faucet-redis-pod
        project: ethernetes
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/redis/redis-stack:7.2.0-v9
        name: ether-faucet-redis-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: eth-ethstats
  name: eth-ethstats
  namespace: eth-project
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: eth-ethstats
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: eth-ethstats
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: WS_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: WS_SECRET
              name: eth-ethstats
        image: ethereumex/eth-stats-dashboard:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: eth-ethstats
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/etl-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: etl-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 6
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: etl
        uba-displayName: UBA_ETL_Service
        uba-groupName: ubaparsers
        uba-serviceName: etl
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.launchers.GenericFunctionLauncher
        - --topic-name
        - RawDataTopic
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -f
        - etl
        - -c
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.ETLFunction
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 2G
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubaparsers
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: etl
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/etl-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: etl-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    metadata:
      name: etl-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghofranechenenaoui/etl_img:latest
        name: etl
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data/data-output
          name: data-output
        - mountPath: /app/logs
          name: logs
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: data-output
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: data-output-pvc
      - name: logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-pvc

---

    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: alb

  namespace: default

  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:

            name: eureka-service
            port:
              number: 8761
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

  name: eureka
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: eureka
  serviceName: eureka-service
  template:

      labels:
        app: eureka

      containers:
      - env:
        - name: EUREKA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: eureka_service_address
              name: configmap
        image: mohkeita/ci-cd-eureka-server
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: eureka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8761

            labels:
              application: selmag-eureka-server
        metrics_path: /actuator/prometheus

          client_secret: vTpeB59Sb2Qzh0HI4cXBlewm2ivY0dzD
          token_url: http://keycloak.selm.ag.192.168.49.2.nip.io/realms/selmag/protocol/openid-connect/token

            - metrics
          endpoint_params:
            grant_type: client_credentials

##### FILE: eureka-server-deployment_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/selmag-eureka-server-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: selmag-eureka-server
  name: selmag-eureka-server-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: selmag-eureka-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: selmag-eureka-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: cloudconfig,k8s
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_URI
          value: http://config:config-password@selmag-config-server-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:8888
        - name: LOKI
          value: http://loki-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:3100
        - name: EUREKA_INSTANCE_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: 192.168.49.1:5000/selmag/eureka-server:0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: selmag-eureka-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8761
      - args:
        - -promscrape.config=/etc/opt/vmagent/promscrape.yaml
        - -remoteWrite.url=http://vm-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:8428/api/v1/write
        - -remoteWrite.label=instance=$(NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: victoriametrics/vmagent:v1.93.12
        name: vmagent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/opt/vmagent
          name: vmconfig
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: eureka-vmagent-cm
        name: vmconfig

---

##### FILE: eureka-service3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cctns-new/StatefulSet/psa-eureka-server-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: eureka
  name: psa-eureka-server-app
  namespace: cctns-new
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: eureka
  serviceName: psa-eureka-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: eureka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: EUREKA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: eureka_server_address
              name: psa-eureka-cm
        - name: CONFIG_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: config_server_address
              name: psa-config-cm
        - name: APPLICATION_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: ACTIVE_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ACTIVE_PROFILE
              name: active-profile
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kolkata
        image: docker-registry:5000/psa-eureka-server:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: eureka-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8761
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      serviceAccount: cctns
      serviceAccountName: cctns

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/event-bus-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: event-bus-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: event-bus
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: event-bus
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ksobitov/event-bus
        name: event-bus

---

##### FILE: event-bus-depl19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/event-bus-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: event-bus-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: event-bus
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: event-bus
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kliao36/event-bus:latest
        name: event-bus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4005

---

policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/event-bus-depl failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: events-webhook
  namespace: argo-events
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: events-webhook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: events-webhook
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - webhook-service
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: PORT
          value: "443"
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argo-events:v1.9.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: webhook
      serviceAccountName: argo-events-webhook-sa

##### FILE: eventtopic-modelgroup01.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/eventtopic-modelgroup01-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: eventtopic-modelgroup01-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: eventtopic-modelgroup01
        uba-displayName: UBA_Streaming_Models_eventtopic-modelgroup01
        uba-groupName: ubastreamingmodels
        uba-serviceName: realtimemodels
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.KafkaModelFunctionExecutor
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -G
        - eventtopic-modelgroup01
        - -f
        - AdPstIocGenerationModel
        - -f
        - LandSpeedViolationModel
        - -f
        - UTDayPerUserModel
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 2G
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubastreamingmodels
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: eventtopic-modelgroup01
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

##### FILE: everything-allowed-exec-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/everything-allowed-exec-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pentest
    type: deployment
  name: everything-allowed-exec-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pentest
      type: deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: pentest
        type: deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - while true; do sleep 30; done;
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - --
        image: ubuntu
        name: everything-allowed-exec-deployment
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host
          name: noderoot
      hostIPC: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: noderoot

---

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

        app: pentest

        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - --
        image: ubuntu

          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host
          name: noderoot
      hostIPC: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true

##### FILE: exam1_dst_cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/postgres-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: postgres-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - |
              TIMESTAMP=$(date +%!F(MISSING)_%!T(MISSING))
              DB_NAME="storedb"
              DB_USER="admin"
              DB_PASSWORD=$(cat /var/secrets/postgres-password)
              LOG_FILE="/mnt/data/backup/backup_log.txt"

              echo "Dbut de la sauvegarde : $TIMESTAMP" >> $LOG_FILE
              PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD pg_dump -U $DB_USER -h postgres-service $DB_NAME > /mnt/data/backup/postgres_backup.sql

              if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
                  echo "Sauvegarde russie  : $TIMESTAMP" >> $LOG_FILE
              else
                  echo "chec de la sauvegarde  : $TIMESTAMP" >> $LOG_FILE
              fi
            command:
            - /bin/bash
            - -c
            image: postgres:12.0-alpine
            name: backup
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /scripts
              name: backup-script
            - mountPath: /mnt/data/backup
              name: backup-volume
            - mountPath: /var/secrets
              name: postgres-secret
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          serviceAccountName: backup-service-account
          volumes:
          - configMap:
              name: backup-script-exam1
            name: backup-script
          - hostPath:
              path: /home/ubuntu/backup/exam1-dst
            name: backup-volume
          - name: postgres-secret
            secret:
              secretName: postgres-secret
  schedule: '*/6 * * * *'

---

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default

      protocol: UDP

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: example-app
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

##### FILE: example-app11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    version: v1
  name: helloworld-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/bootstrapOverride: istio-custom-bootstrap-config
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/istio/examples-helloworld-v1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/example-app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: example-app
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
