1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/helloworld-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/helloworld-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/helloworld-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/helloworld-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/helloworld-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/helloworld-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: example-app7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    version: v1
  name: helloworld-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/bootstrapOverride: istio-custom-bootstrap-config
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/istio/examples-helloworld-v1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

##### FILE: example-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apparmor/ConfigMap/apparmor-profiles:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  k8s-nginx: |-
    #include <tunables/global>

    # From https://github.com/jfrazelle/bane/blob/master/docker-nginx-sample
    profile k8s-nginx flags=(attach_disconnected,mediate_deleted) {
      #include <abstractions/base>

      network inet tcp,
      network inet udp,
      network inet icmp,

      deny network raw,

      deny network packet,

      file,
      umount,

      deny /bin/** wl,
      deny /boot/** wl,
      deny /dev/** wl,
      deny /etc/** wl,
      deny /home/** wl,
      deny /lib/** wl,
      deny /lib64/** wl,
      deny /media/** wl,
      deny /mnt/** wl,
      deny /opt/** wl,
      deny /proc/** wl,
      deny /root/** wl,
      deny /sbin/** wl,
      deny /srv/** wl,
      deny /tmp/** wl,
      deny /sys/** wl,
      deny /usr/** wl,

      audit /** w,

      /var/run/nginx.pid w,

      /usr/sbin/nginx ix,

      deny /bin/dash mrwklx,
      deny /bin/sh mrwklx,
      deny /usr/bin/top mrwklx,

      capability chown,
      capability dac_override,
      capability setuid,
      capability setgid,
      capability net_bind_service,

      deny @{PROC}/{*,**^[0-9*],sys/kernel/shm*} wkx,
      deny @{PROC}/sysrq-trigger rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/mem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kmem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kcore rwklx,
      deny mount,
      deny /sys/[^f]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/f[^s]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/[^c]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/c[^g]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/cg[^r]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/firmware/efi/efivars/** rwklx,
      deny /sys/kernel/security/** rwklx,
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: apparmor-profiles
  namespace: apparmor

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: example-configmap1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apparmor/ConfigMap/apparmor-profiles:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  k8s-nginx: |-
    #include <tunables/global>

    # From https://github.com/jfrazelle/bane/blob/master/docker-nginx-sample
    profile k8s-nginx flags=(attach_disconnected,mediate_deleted) {
      #include <abstractions/base>

      network inet tcp,
      network inet udp,
      network inet icmp,

      deny network raw,

      deny network packet,

      file,
      umount,

      deny /bin/** wl,
      deny /boot/** wl,
      deny /dev/** wl,
      deny /etc/** wl,
      deny /home/** wl,
      deny /lib/** wl,
      deny /lib64/** wl,
      deny /media/** wl,
      deny /mnt/** wl,
      deny /opt/** wl,
      deny /proc/** wl,
      deny /root/** wl,
      deny /sbin/** wl,
      deny /srv/** wl,
      deny /tmp/** wl,
      deny /sys/** wl,
      deny /usr/** wl,

      audit /** w,

      /var/run/nginx.pid w,

      /usr/sbin/nginx ix,

      deny /bin/dash mrwklx,
      deny /bin/sh mrwklx,
      deny /usr/bin/top mrwklx,

      capability chown,
      capability dac_override,
      capability setuid,
      capability setgid,
      capability net_bind_service,

      deny @{PROC}/{*,**^[0-9*],sys/kernel/shm*} wkx,
      deny @{PROC}/sysrq-trigger rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/mem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kmem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kcore rwklx,
      deny mount,
      deny /sys/[^f]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/f[^s]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/[^c]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/c[^g]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/cg[^r]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/firmware/efi/efivars/** rwklx,
      deny /sys/kernel/security/** rwklx,
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: apparmor-profiles
  namespace: apparmor

---

##### FILE: example-configmap11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apparmor/ConfigMap/apparmor-profiles:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  k8s-nginx: |-
    #include <tunables/global>

    # From https://github.com/jfrazelle/bane/blob/master/docker-nginx-sample
    profile k8s-nginx flags=(attach_disconnected,mediate_deleted) {
      #include <abstractions/base>

      network inet tcp,
      network inet udp,
      network inet icmp,

      deny network raw,

      deny network packet,

      file,
      umount,

      deny /bin/** wl,
      deny /boot/** wl,
      deny /dev/** wl,
      deny /etc/** wl,
      deny /home/** wl,
      deny /lib/** wl,
      deny /lib64/** wl,
      deny /media/** wl,
      deny /mnt/** wl,
      deny /opt/** wl,
      deny /proc/** wl,
      deny /root/** wl,
      deny /sbin/** wl,
      deny /srv/** wl,
      deny /tmp/** wl,
      deny /sys/** wl,
      deny /usr/** wl,

      audit /** w,

      /var/run/nginx.pid w,

      /usr/sbin/nginx ix,

      deny /bin/dash mrwklx,
      deny /bin/sh mrwklx,
      deny /usr/bin/top mrwklx,

      capability chown,
      capability dac_override,
      capability setuid,
      capability setgid,
      capability net_bind_service,

      deny @{PROC}/{*,**^[0-9*],sys/kernel/shm*} wkx,
      deny @{PROC}/sysrq-trigger rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/mem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kmem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kcore rwklx,
      deny mount,
      deny /sys/[^f]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/f[^s]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/[^c]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/c[^g]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/cg[^r]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/firmware/efi/efivars/** rwklx,
      deny /sys/kernel/security/** rwklx,
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: apparmor-profiles
  namespace: apparmor

---

      deny /etc/** wl,

      deny /sys/fs/cg[^r]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/firmware/efi/efivars/** rwklx,
      deny /sys/kernel/security/** rwklx,
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: apparmor-profiles
  namespace: apparmor

apiVersion: v1
data:
  k8s-nginx: |-
    #include <tunables/global>

    # From https://github.com/jfrazelle/bane/blob/master/docker-nginx-sample
    profile k8s-nginx flags=(attach_disconnected,mediate_deleted) {
      #include <abstractions/base>

      network inet tcp,
      network inet udp,
      network inet icmp,

      deny network raw,

      deny network packet,

      file,
      umount,

      deny /bin/** wl,
      deny /boot/** wl,
      deny /dev/** wl,
      deny /etc/** wl,
      deny /home/** wl,
      deny /lib/** wl,
      deny /lib64/** wl,
      deny /media/** wl,
      deny /mnt/** wl,
      deny /opt/** wl,
      deny /proc/** wl,
      deny /root/** wl,
      deny /sbin/** wl,
      deny /srv/** wl,
      deny /tmp/** wl,
      deny /sys/** wl,
      deny /usr/** wl,

      audit /** w,

      /var/run/nginx.pid w,

      /usr/sbin/nginx ix,

      deny /bin/dash mrwklx,
      deny /bin/sh mrwklx,
      deny /usr/bin/top mrwklx,

      capability chown,
      capability dac_override,
      capability setuid,
      capability setgid,
      capability net_bind_service,

      deny @{PROC}/{*,**^[0-9*],sys/kernel/shm*} wkx,
      deny @{PROC}/sysrq-trigger rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/mem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kmem rwklx,
      deny @{PROC}/kcore rwklx,
      deny mount,
      deny /sys/[^f]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/f[^s]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/[^c]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/c[^g]*/** wklx,
      deny /sys/fs/cg[^r]*/** wklx,

  namespace: apparmor

##### FILE: example-cron-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/job-example:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: job-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - env:
            - name: SOME_ENV_VAR
              value: my-env-value
            image: my-repo/my-container:52f50c7
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            name: job-example
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 500m
                ephemeral-storage: 5Gi
                memory: 2Gi
          restartPolicy: Never
          serviceAccountName: readonly-sa
  schedule: 20 * * * *

---

##### FILE: example-daemon.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    daemon: apparmor-loader
  name: apparmor-loader
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      daemon: apparmor-loader
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        daemon: apparmor-loader
      name: apparmor-loader
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -poll
        - 30s
        - /profiles
        image: google/apparmor-loader:latest
        name: apparmor-loader
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/apparmor.d
          name: apparmor-includes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /profiles
          name: profiles
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/apparmor.d
        name: apparmor-includes
      - configMap:
          name: apparmor-profiles
        name: profiles

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet

  labels:
    daemon: apparmor-loader
  name: apparmor-loader
  namespace: apparmor

    matchLabels:
      daemon: apparmor-loader
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        daemon: apparmor-loader
      name: apparmor-loader
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -poll
        - 30s
        - /profiles
        image: google/apparmor-loader:latest
        name: apparmor-loader
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true

          name: apparmor-includes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /profiles
          name: profiles
          readOnly: true

      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys

          path: /etc/apparmor.d
        name: apparmor-includes
      - configMap:
          name: apparmor-profiles

##### FILE: example-daemon11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    daemon: apparmor-loader
  name: apparmor-loader
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      daemon: apparmor-loader
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        daemon: apparmor-loader
      name: apparmor-loader
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -poll
        - 30s
        - /profiles
        image: google/apparmor-loader:latest
        name: apparmor-loader
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/apparmor.d
          name: apparmor-includes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /profiles
          name: profiles
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/apparmor.d
        name: apparmor-includes
      - configMap:
          name: apparmor-profiles
        name: profiles

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: example-daemon3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apparmor/DaemonSet/apparmor-loader:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    daemon: apparmor-loader
  name: apparmor-loader
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      daemon: apparmor-loader
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        daemon: apparmor-loader
      name: apparmor-loader
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -poll
        - 30s
        - /profiles
        image: google/apparmor-loader:latest
        name: apparmor-loader
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/apparmor.d
          name: apparmor-includes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /profiles
          name: profiles
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/apparmor.d
        name: apparmor-includes
      - configMap:
          name: apparmor-profiles
        name: profiles

---

##### FILE: example-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydeployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: mydeployment
  name: mydeployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mydeployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mydeployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: example-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to labelReplaceNamespace/Deployment/nameReplace:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: labelReplace
  name: nameReplace
  namespace: labelReplaceNamespace
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: labelReplace
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: labelReplace
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: HOST
          value: 0.0.0.0
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/aks/e2e/bloomberg-goldpinger:v3.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: goldpinger
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 80Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 40Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccount: goldpinger-serviceaccount
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: example
  name: example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: example
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VAR_KEY
          value: VAR_VAL
        image: DOCKER_REPOSITORY_ORG/DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME:VERSION_TAG
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health_check
            port: 5050
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: example
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness_check
            port: 5050
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: example-ingress6_1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Ingress/example-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: example-ingress
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: hello-world.test
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: hello-world-app
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: '*.hello-world.test'
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: hello-world-app
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: example-namespace.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/apparmor:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: apparmor
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/apparmor:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/apparmor:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/apparmor:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/apparmor:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
pass: 5, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/apparmor:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: apparmor
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---
